basic_information.scholarship_name: The Fred and Catherine Turpin Scholarship for Speech-Language Pathology
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - The Fred and Catherine Turpin Scholarship f
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: ?Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a degree in Speech Language Pathology. Eligibility Requirements Must be enrolled in the graduate program in Speech-Language Pathology at UCO In a short essay, please demonstrate how you show professionalism on a daily basis, how you plan to impact your community after graduation, and the financial need for this scholarship
